description: Very simple game, essentially dominoes with cardboard land tiles. Hated my first 3 plays of it, but kept getting talked into playing and now see it as a nice lightweight game to play with those not into the heavier side of gaming. Also, there is more here than meets the eye, especially with the different variants.

title: Fast, Fun,...
description: Fast, Fun, and easy to teach. I enjoyed playing this with my family during the pandemic, and It is one of my new favorite games to play

title: A surprisi...
description: A surprisingly simple yet deep experience that provides a level of fulfillment not many expensive, hobbiest-oriented/big box games do. I was surprised that at $11.99 this game would bring me so much joy, but I guess it having Spiel des Jahres 2017 should've been indicative enough of that. Excellent game.

title: A surprisi...
description: A surprisingly simple yet deep experience that provides a level of fulfillment not many expensive, hobbiest-oriented/big box games do. I was surprised that at $11.99 this game would bring me so much joy, but I guess it having Spiel des Jahres 2017 should've been indicative enough of that. Excellent game.

title: Plays quic...
description: Plays quick and easy to teach.  I like the artwork of the tiles and how the tiles fit together so well.  I will be playing many more times in the future.After playing this game more I bumped it up to a 10. This is one of the best games I have played.

title: Super fun,...
description: Super fun, smart and quick game. I love how the turn order is determined.

title: Played a h...
description: Played a handful of times with 2-4 players and it's an enjoyable game, but my son doesn't really like it, so have traded it away to make room for other games. Could buy it again cheaply and so I did. Let's see if it will get some playtime.

title: Quick setu...
description: Quick setup and play through.  Easily teachable.  Very light, great for starting a night or ending one.

title: Great Kids Game
description: Play this with my nephews, and it's fun. a bit on the light side for adults, but it's uber quick, 10 - 15 minutes, before the attention span evaporates.

title: Expansions...
description:
Expansions:
- Age of Giants

A very fast back and forth tile laying game where you try to match up similar terrains in order to get the most points. There's a neat little extra challenge where if you keep your castle tile in the middle of your tableau, you get additional points.

title: Extremely ...
description: Extremely short, but fun, tile-laying game
